It keeps telling me to close all running programs, clear temporary folder and check my internet but I did all that, yet it won't go to set up! Anyone know how to fix this?!

Used robotkill's serial and worked like a charm.

Notice that the torrent contains an .iso file that is the installation package, so to start the installation process you have basically 2 options:

1.try to burn a cd and run it, just as it were a purchased installation disk

or, which is more practical and recommended

2.download and install a software that emulates cd and dvd drives so you can run .iso files without having to burn them. Robotkill instructs you to install daemon tools, that is such software, but any other -- such as alcohol 120% -- will do the trick just fine. Do a torrent search and get one of those.

As far as the serial goes, these that were provided should work.
